function.name: schedule_appointment
function.description: Book a service appointment. PREFERRED: First get two time options via check_availability, then after customer chooses a slot call this with customer_name, phone, address, and chosen_slot_start (from check_availability's next_available_slots[].start). Alternatively, first call without chosen_slot_start returns two slots â€” then call again with chosen_slot_start to book. Creates appointment, CRM lead, and FSM task in Odoo.

service_type.description: Optional. Do not ask before first call; only include if already known (e.g. maintenance).

preferred_time_windows.description: Optional. Do not ask before first call; backend returns two options without it.

chosen_slot_start.description: On second call when booking: ISO datetime of the slot the customer chose (e.g. 2026-01-27T10:00:00). Copy from previous response next_available_slots[].start. Do not send on first call.

confirmed_partner_id.description: Use this existing Odoo partner ID when customer confirmed their profile from lookup_customer_profile

caller_type.description: Whether the caller is a tenant or part of the property management team

preferred_date.description: Date of chosen slot (YYYY-MM-DD). Use with preferred_time when booking the chosen slot if chosen_slot_start is not available.

preferred_time.description: Time of chosen slot (e.g. 10:00). Use with preferred_date when booking the chosen slot if chosen_slot_start is not available.
